about_the_game:
Story-driven crazy adventure

Dive into the world of foul-mouthed dwarves brewing beer and blasting enemies with rifles. 

Defend your brewery from bandits and rivals, or perhaps you'll find unexpected allies among the arrogant, proud winged elves—who despise rude dwarves at every turn. But young elvish innkeeper Inguriel? She might be different... probably.

Explore the world in four directions

The game uses a pseudo-top-down motion principle, allowing you to move not only left and right but also upwards and downwards, opening great opportunities to explore the world. This mechanic perfectly suits the setting of an underground world populated by dwarves and occasionally visited by elves from the surface.

Challenge the darkness

You will often need to explore dark mines and galleries. Turn on your flashlight and shoot anything lurking in the darkness!

Explore the rich world

A vast world with underground labyrinths, mines and passages connecting six cities lies ahead of you, waiting for a hero! And when you return from another dark adventure, talk to the characters, uncover their secrets, and receive your next quests!

Good luck, dwerg!
